players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Alice and she is the mafioso. Vote Alice today to win."
You: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night - he's the mafioso. We should vote Bob out."
You: "Diana is the real mafioso trying to frame me. I'm the detective and confirmed Bob was innocent last night. Vote Diana to save the town."
Bob: "I think Alice is the mafioso because she's been acting suspiciously and she was the first one to point fingers at Bob, which makes her look guilty. Her story seems fishy."
Diana: "Alice is lying. I am the detective and investigated her last night - she is mafioso. Bob is innocent. Vote Alice to win."
